dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: Welcome to the land of Eldoria, a mystical realm of wonder and magic. Your journey begins in the small village of Willowdale.

dialogues.speaker: Village Elder
dialogues.text: Greetings young adventurer, we've been expecting you. We've heard rumors of a dark force stirring in the heart of the forest. We need someone brave to investigate and put an end to it.
